http.title: Zen Internet | cPanel Holding Page
http.html:
This domain name is hosted by Zen Internet

Domain Holding Page

This Web space has been set to point to this page to let you know that the Web space is active, although its owner is currently not using it to publish a Web site.

If you are the owner of this domain, you can upload content via FTP software or by using your control panel.

You can use the following file names for the home page:

  • index.html
  • index.shtml
  • index.htm
  • default.htm
  • default.html

If you need any assistance with your Web Space then you can get support from:

  • W:www.zen.co.uk/support
  • T:01706 902009
  • E:support@zen.co.uk

For full information about Zen Internet's domain name registration and Web hosting services visit: http:www.zen.co.uk/hosting

Alternatively you can call us on 01706 902 000.

Zen Internet provide a wide range of Internet services. Please visit www.zen.co.uk for more information or use the links below:

  • Broadband
  • Voice
  • Leased Lines
  • IP VPN
  • Managed Firewalls
  • Data Backup
  • Domains & Hosting

						<h1 style="text-align: center;" data-inline-fontsize="true" data-inline-lineheight="true" data-fontsize="30" data-lineheight="42">Data Centre Solutions For Today, Tomorrow & Beyond</h1>
<p>Since being established in 1990, EDP Europe Limited has been delivering high quality, innovative infrastructure solutions to the IT & data centre industry across the UK and EMEA for more than 25 years.</p>
<p>In today’s data driven economy, demand for increased data processing power, data storage, and cloud services is driving the need for more and more data centre capacity, faster IT systems, and improved efficiency. New corporate and multi-tenant data centre facilities are being constructed to support this demand, and existing or legacy data centres are being refurbished to achieve improvements in efficiency across both facilities (energy efficiency) and IT (service delivery). Data management, privacy, efficiency, and compliance with corporate, industry and regulatory standards are contributing to a constantly evolving landscape. The need to ensure your infrastructure meets not only the requirements for today but for tomorrow and beyond has never been greater.</p>
<p>EDP Europe builds on its many years of experience, to provide a wealth of knowledge and a broad portfolio of leading edge systems to optimise the overall performance of our customers’ data centres and enterprise IT environments. From design & build to ongoing operational management, EDP Europe offers technologies and solutions that can support the life-cycle of your critical IT environments to increase efficiency, resiliency, flexibility and security.</p>
<p><strong>If you are looking for ways to improve the overall performance of your data centre or enterprise IT space please <a href="https://www.edpeurope.com/contact-2/">contact us</a> or call +44 (0)1376 510337 to find out how EDP Europe can help.</strong></p>
<div class="fusion-clearfix"></div>

						<h1 style="text-align: center;">Supporting Data Centre Life-cycle</h1>
<p>Constant and rapid changes in technology mean that IT infrastructure needs be to future proof in order to support ever increasing demand for service. EDP Europe provides a range of solutions that improve the efficiency, security, compliance and performance of your data centre or IT room at whatever stage of the life-cycle your environment is at.</p>
<div class="fusion-clearfix"></div>

						<div class="fusion-title title fusion-sep-none fusion-title-center fusion-title-size-two" style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:10px;"><h2 class="title-heading-center"><strong>Design & Build</strong></h2></div><p><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-15115" src="https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/design-and-build.jpg" alt="Data Centre Design and Build Solutions" width="600" height="600" srcset="https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/design-and-build-66x66.jpg 66w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/design-and-build-80x80.jpg 80w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/design-and-build-120x120.jpg 120w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/design-and-build-200x200.jpg 200w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/design-and-build-300x300.jpg 300w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/design-and-build-400x400.jpg 400w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/design-and-build-500x500.jpg 500w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/design-and-build.jpg 600w" sizes="(max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px" /></p>
<p>EDP Europe specialises in physical infrastructure solutions critical to the early stages of successfully designing an efficient, secure, responsive new build or refurbished IT environment. Making sure that best of breed solutions are considered at this early design stage will ensure that the data centre or IT room will be constructed in such a way that it will operate optimally and efficiently throughout its entire life-cycle. Starting from the fundamental aspects of the building architecture and cooling design, EDP Europe can assist across many aspects of a data centre’s construction and fit out, including: Permanent <a href="https://www.edpeurope.com/product/hot-aisle-containment/">hot aisle containment (HAC)</a>, <a href="https://www.edpeurope.com/product/cold-aisle-containment/">cold aisle containment (CAC)</a>, <a href="https://www.edpeurope.com/product/bergvik-iso-floor-raised-access-floor/">raised access floor (RAF)</a>, high density <a href="/product-category/infrastructure/metz-connect-copper-structured-cabling/">copper</a> and <a href="/product-category/infrastructure/fibre-optic-solutions/">fibre structured cabling</a>, <a href="/product-category/infrastructure/19-enclosures/">19″ IT racks</a>, <a href="/product-category/electronics-monitoring/basic-power-distribution/">power distribution units (PDUs)</a>, <a href="/product-category/electronics-monitoring/intelligent-power-management-pdu/">power management</a> and <a href="/product-category/electronics-monitoring/environmental-monitoring/">environmental monitoring</a>, <a href="/product-category/electronics-monitoring/rack-security-access-control/">access control</a>, and <a href="/product-category/electronics-monitoring/rfid-asset-tracking-solutions/">asset tracking</a>.</p>

						<div class="fusion-title title fusion-sep-none fusion-title-center fusion-title-size-two" style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:10px;"><h2 class="title-heading-center"><strong>Optimisation</strong></h2></div><p><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-15117" src="https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/optimisation.jpg" alt="Data Centre Optimisation" width="600" height="600" srcset="https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/optimisation-66x66.jpg 66w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/optimisation-80x80.jpg 80w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/optimisation-120x120.jpg 120w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/optimisation-200x200.jpg 200w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/optimisation-300x300.jpg 300w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/optimisation-400x400.jpg 400w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/optimisation-500x500.jpg 500w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/optimisation.jpg 600w" sizes="(max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px" /></p>
<p>Optimising how data centres are cooled and clearly defined <a href="/product-category/airflow-management/">airflow management (AFM)</a> strategies can have an enormous and immediate positive effect on cooling efficiency that can help cut energy costs significantly. EDP Europe leads the way in providing airflow management solutions that help drive cooling optimisation, improve energy efficiency and contribute to significant cost savings. From conducting cooling surveys to highlight areas where improvements can be made, to installing aisle containment systems, EDP Europe offer a host of solutions to optimise cooling systems including: <a href="/product-category/airflow-management/koldlok-floor-grommets/">KoldLok</a> the leading solution for sealing cable openings in raised floors, <a href="/product-category/airflow-management/blanking-panels-rack-airflow/">blanking panels </a>for sealing unused 19” rack space, <a href="/product-category/airflow-management/triad-floor-grille/">Triad airflow grilles </a>for improving the delivery of cold air in front of IT racks and a range of <a href="/product-category/airflow-management/modular-aisle-containment/">modular</a> and bespoke aisle containment systems.</p>

						<div class="fusion-title title fusion-sep-none fusion-title-center fusion-title-size-two" style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:10px;"><h2 class="title-heading-center"><strong>Management</strong></h2></div><p><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-15118" src="https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/management.jpg" alt="Data Centre Management Solutions" width="600" height="600" srcset="https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/management-66x66.jpg 66w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/management-80x80.jpg 80w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/management-120x120.jpg 120w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/management-200x200.jpg 200w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/management-300x300.jpg 300w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/management-400x400.jpg 400w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/management-500x500.jpg 500w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/management.jpg 600w" sizes="(max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px" /></p>
<p>Once operational, EDP Europe can assist with a range of technologies to make day-to-day management of the data centre or IT space easier and more efficient. Systems available from EDP include: <a href="/product-category/electronics-monitoring/intelligent-power-management-pdu/">remote power monitoring</a> and management, <a href="/product-category/electronics-monitoring/environmental-monitoring/">environmental monitoring</a>, <a href="/product-category/electronics-monitoring/rack-security-access-control/">19” cabinet access control</a>, <a href="https://www.edpeurope.com/product/sensorium-dcim-solution/">data centre infrastructure management (DCIM)</a>, <a href="/product-category/electronics-monitoring/rfid-asset-tracking-solutions/">asset tracking</a>, and remote server management utilising the latest <a href="/product-category/electronics-monitoring/kvm-switches/">KVM switch technology</a>.</p>

						<div class="fusion-title title fusion-sep-none fusion-title-center fusion-title-size-two" style="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:10px;"><h2 class="title-heading-center"><strong>Security</strong></h2></div><p><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-15119" src="https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/security.jpg" alt="Data Centre Security" width="600" height="600" srcset="https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/security-66x66.jpg 66w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/security-80x80.jpg 80w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/security-120x120.jpg 120w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/security-200x200.jpg 200w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/security-300x300.jpg 300w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/security-400x400.jpg 400w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/security-500x500.jpg 500w, https://www.edpeurope.com/wp-content/uploads/security.jpg 600w" sizes="(max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px" /></p>
<p>With ever tightening regulatory controls and compliance requirements (e.g. PCI/DSS, FCA, GDPR, Webtrust), focus on information security and data protection has never been greater. However, physically securing, controlling and reporting of access to, and the movement of IT equipment is often overlooked or a secondary concern. To help organisations mitigate this risk EDP Europe offers multi layered security solutions that protect IT equipment installed in 19″ racks including <a href="/product/tz-centurion-rack-security-system/">retro-fitting rack access control</a>, <a href="/product/biometric-swipe-access-card/">biometric access control</a>, in-rack CCTV, and asset tracking solutions.</p>
